hadiths.text: ‘Urwah reported on the authority of ‘A’ishah:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to pray at night and she (‘A’ishah) would lie between him and the qiblah, sleeping on the bed on which he would sleep. When he wanted to offer the witr prayer, he awakened her and she offered the witr prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَالَ الْمَرْأَةُ لاَ تَقْطَعُ الصَّلاَةَ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Said That the Woman Does Not Nullify The Prayer
